title: Too Much To Lose
lyrics:
30, you a motherfuckin' fool, nigga
Cheeze, Cheeze, Cheeze
30, you a fool for this one
Yeah, yeah
I rock Balenciaga, Prada, fuck a model for a bottle

Hit a nigga bitch, she actin' like she hit the lotto

Bought the Demon for a drop, I hit the highway on the cop

I bought a bunch of chains for the gang flooded out with rocks

Too much to lose, drippin' in jewels

Come through in the coupe drippin' in jewels

I rock Balenciaga, Prada, fuck a model for a bottle

Hit a nigga bitch, she actin' like she hit the lotto



I remember back when I was broke

She ain't give me throat, now she give me throat

'Cause DDG the GOAT, I don't like to boast

But you should take some notes, nigga, you's a ho, huh?

Off-White Prestos, made it out the ghetto

Humble and I'm mellow, but still know I'm the best, though

Latina give me besos, and she from Sacramento

DDG finna blow like Coke mixed with Mentos



I rock Balenciaga, Prada, fuck a model for a bottle

Hit a nigga bitch, she actin' like she hit the lotto

Bought the Demon for a drop, I hit the highway on the cop

I bought a bunch of chains for the gang flooded out with rocks

Too much to lose, drippin' in jewels

Come through in the coupe drippin' in jewels

I rock Balenciaga, Prada, fuck a model for a bottle

Hit a nigga bitch, she actin' like she hit the lotto



She want a ring and I said, "No way"

She can't find better so she said, "Okay"

Champagne sippin', I fuck with ros√©

Where the bad bitches? I'm tryna locate

She love to call me papi, they like to call me daddy

But I can't be your daddy 'cause I ain't fuck your mammy

I like my girls classy, but love 'em when they nasty

I met her in the valley, the plane became in handy, yeah



I rock Balenciaga, Prada, fuck a model for a bottle

Hit a nigga bitch, she actin' like she hit the lotto

Bought the Demon for a drop, I hit the highway on the cop

I bought a bunch of chains for the gang flooded out with rocks

Too much to lose, drippin' in jewels

Come through in the coupe drippin' in jewels

I rock Balenciaga, Prada, fuck a model for a bottle

Hit a nigga bitch, she actin' like she hit the lotto
